Description: Green glazed composition amulet in the form of Khons, standing and wearing moon disc, with arms by sides, face black, very crudely formed, back pillar pierced behind head. The small figure is shown in the abbreviated form common in mass-produced amulets.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie
Curator's comments: W.M.F. Petrie, Tanis ii, Nebesheh and Defenneh, pl. viii, 26.
